sentences.en: Antique shops exert a peculiar fascination on a great many people.
sentences.cn: 古玩店对许多人有一种特殊的魅力.

sentences.en: Certain particles will exert equal forces.
sentences.cn: 某些尘粒将受到相等的力.

sentences.en: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.cn: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

sentences.en: Exert thy voice, sweet harbinger of spring!
sentences.cn: 敞开嗓门吧, 春天甜美的使者!

sentences.en: He doesn't have to exert himself on my behalf.
sentences.cn: 他不必为我费那麽大力气.

sentences.en: He exerted considerable influence on the thinking of the scientific community on these issues.
sentences.cn: 他对科学界在这些问题上的思考施加了相当大的影响。

sentences.en: He has exerted himself tirelessly on behalf of the charity.
sentences.cn: 他为这个慈善组织奋斗不懈。

sentences.en: He likes to exert his authority.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢行使自己的权力.

sentences.en: He must exert himself to subdue so proud a display of resentment.
sentences.cn: 他必须施展本事,征服这种因忌恨而产生的骄傲.

sentences.en: If you exert all your strength you can move that rock.
sentences.cn: 如果你把所有的劲都使出来,你就能移动那块石头了.

sentences.en: Please exert your best efforts to settle the matter.
sentences.cn: 请尽最大努力解决此事.

sentences.en: The consumer will exert a measure of influence over the market economy.
sentences.cn: 消费者会对市场经济产生一定程度的影响.

sentences.en: The more self-knowledge we have, the more control we can exert over our feelings and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 我们越有自知之明就越能控制自己的感情和行为。

sentences.en: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.cn: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.en: We all know that when we exert ourselves our heart rate increases.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道太卖命了会导致心跳加速。

sentences.en: We must exert ourselves to catch up with them, or it would be too late.
sentences.cn: 我们要急起直追, 否则就太晚了.

sentences.en: We should exert ourselves in the struggle for the modernization of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 我们应为实现科学技术现代化而努力.

trans.tran_en: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen
